concept.title: Bitmaps
concept.shortdesc: Bitmaps are used for Raster (pixel-based) images in Figma.

conbody.section: A bitmap is a digital image format that stores an image as a grid of pixels, where each pixel has its own color information. Also reffered to as 'raster graphics' (link location), bitmaps are ideal for detailed, realistic images like photographs. But bitmaps can become pixelated if resized beyond their fixed resolution.

Common file formats include:
BMP
JPEG
PNG
GIF
